channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Confirms Bad News For Gmail Users—Popular Feature Stops Now
item.description: Your Gmail is about to change — and most users have no idea this is happening.

item.title: Founder Of Chinese AI Model Developer MiniMax Becomes A Billionaire As Shares Surge On Listing
item.description: Yan Junjie, the 36-year-old chairman and CEO of MiniMax, now boasts a net worth of $3.2 billion after the AI model developer’s $618 million Hong Kong ...

item.title: Urgent recall: 13K chargers sold at TJ Maxx, Marshalls may explode during use
item.description: More than 13,000 wireless chargers sold in the U.S. at T.J. Maxx and Marshalls have been recalled over fears that they could "explode while in use."

item.title: Singapore-based startup founder Anand Roy thinks generative AI can help fix a broken music sector
item.description: Roy started Wubble in 2024; now his generated tunes are used by global giants and even the Taipei Metro, to soothe harried commuters.

item.title: PixVerse Can Now Generate Multi-Shot Videos From A Single Prompt
item.description: PixVerse V5.5 generates multi-shot videos from a single prompt with camera changes, sound, and dialogue, reducing the need for manual editing.

item.title: Verizon chief talent officer says Gen Z grads shouldn’t snub retail or hospitality jobs in the current economy: ‘Just start somewhere’
item.description: As AI steals entry-level office jobs, Verizon’s chief talent officer says Gen Z grads should be 'open to a different path.' Namely, retail and hospita...

item.title: CES Stories:SmallRig Reframes Filmmaking To a Creative Ecosystem
item.description: SmallRig positioned itself a broader movement: the rise of smartphone filmmaking, creator-driven innovation, and the gradual shift from accessories to...

item.title: Keychron’s New Computer Keyboards At CES 2026 Have A 660-Hour Battery Life
item.description: Mechanical keyboard brand Keychron has unveiled new products at CES2026, including luxury and special-edition keyboards mad with unusual materials and...

item.title: Could ‘Trump accounts’ make your kids millionaires? Maybe — with this strategy.
What Trump's plan to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds means for mortgage rates

item.title: Mass shootings on campus give rise to a new kind of life-saving service journalism: an anonymous message board called Sidechat
item.description: Described by Harvard Magazine as “the College’s stream of collective consciousness,” Sidechat allows anyone with a verified university email to post.

item.title: From George Floyd to Trump calling Somali immigrants ‘garbage’ to a fatal ICE shooting, Minnesota’s in the crosshairs
item.description: In June, a Democratic state lawmaker and her husband were assassinated by a Trump supporter, although conservatives blame Tim Walz.

item.title: Tennessee theater professor reinstated, with $500,000 settlement, after losing his job over a Charlie Kirk-related social media post
item.description: Sen. Marsha Blackburn had circulated a screenshot indicating the professor had posted a headline about Charlie Kirk's stance on the 2nd Amendment.

item.title: Stocks face first real test of 2026 with jobs report, possible tariff ruling
Tech is slumping, but these sectors and stocks are off to a fast start to 2026
Private sector added fewer-than-expected 41,000 jobs in December, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 47,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a l...

item.title: Dallas mayor predicts 'avalanche' of NYC financial firms fleeing new socialist policies under Mamdani
item.description: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson predicts financial firms will flee New York City for Texas as the Big Apple's new mayor pursues socialist policies.

item.title: Trump announces plans to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes
item.description: President Donald Trump announced he is moving forward with plans to ban institutional investors from purchasing single-family homes in an effort to im...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
